creditline: Gift of the family of Esther Parada:  Adam Wilson, son; Margo Davion and Susan Peters, sisters; and Benjamin Glaser, brother
description: man, woman and child seated on sidewalk; each wears a hat; short wall behind family; paper cutouts on strings tied to poles; mounted on board
dimension: 15 3/4 x 19 11/16 in. (40.01 x 50.01 cm) (image, sheet, mount)
inscription:
Inscription and Label

on back, in black ink: [CAMPESINO FAMILY / (SUCRE, BOLIVIA MARKET)]
title: Campesino Family, Sucre Market, Bolivia
